nodes.text: Cabur-class starfighters, named for the Mando'a word for "protector", were wedge-shaped, twin-engine snubfighters furnished by Mandalore Fenn Shysa during the battle over Endor during the Nagai–Tof War. The fighters were manufactured by MandalMotors following the death of the Suprema. Shysa provided twelve Cabur-class fighters piloted by his Mandalorian Protectors to assist the Alliance of Free Planets.
